[[Image:9468v.jpg|frame|right|250px|Our Lady of the Rockies {{deletable image-caption|Thursday, 11 November 2010}}]]
'''Our Lady of the Rockies''' is a 90-foot (27 m) [[statue]] of [[Mary (mother of Jesus)|Mary, the Mother of Jesus]], that sits atop the [[Continental Divide]] overlooking [[Butte, Montana]]. It is the [[United States]]'s largest [[Madonna (art)|Madonna]] and its second largest statue.
'''Our Lady of the Rockies''' is a 90-foot (27 m) [[statue]] of [[Mary (mother of Jesus)|Mary, the Mother of Jesus]], that sits atop the [[Continental Divide]] overlooking [[Butte, Montana]]. It is the [[United States]]'s largest [[Madonna (art)|Madonna]] and its second largest statue.
